role.argrole: things whose names sound the same

example.parse: (IP (PP-ADV (P 至於) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (PP-PRP (P 因为) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP (P 与) (NP (NN 钱财) )) (VP (VV 谐音))))) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 成) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 金)) (NP (NN 鸡母) ))))) (DEC 的))))) (PU ，) (PP-ADV (P 除了) (NP (NN 金钱豹) (NN 饰物) )) (PU ，) (DP-TMP (DT 前) (QP (CD 几) (CLP (M 年)))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NN 台湾人) ) (VP (ADVP (AD 还)) (ADVP (AD 曾)) (ADVP (AD 一窝蜂)) (VP (VV 流行) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 买) (NP-OBJ (PU 「) (NN 棺材) (PU 」)))))))
